data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Ampara, Sri Lanka to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ampara, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 4 believers in Ampara to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 43,797 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Ampara, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Ampara, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Chinese, general people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Ampara to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Ampara, Sri Lanka that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ampara, Sri Lanka has a population of 43,800.

We estimate Ampara has 4 people who might know Jesus, 3,351 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 40,446 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10,950 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 40,446 who are far from you in Ampara, Sri Lanka from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Ampara
location.people_groups_list: Konta Durayi, Sindhi (Muslim traditions), Sri Lanka Moor, Osta (Nasuva), Hanomoreyo
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Konta Durayi (1,900), Sindhi (Muslim traditions) (1,000), Sri Lanka Moor (676,000), Osta (Nasuva) (8,100), Hanomoreyo (5,300)
